Direct Entry Requirements:
Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Chemistry, Mathematics, Physics and Biology.

 

NCE/ND/HND in related programmes plus the UTME requirements.
UTME Requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Chemistry, Mathematics, Physics and Biology.
Subjects: Biology, Chemistry and Physics or Mathematics.

Direct Entry Requirements:
i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes from Chemistry, Biology, Botany/Zoology.

(ii) NCE merit accepted.
UTME Requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Biology, Chemistry and Mathematics/Physics.
Subjects: Biology, Chemistry and Physics or Mathematics.

Direct Entry Requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Biology/Botany/Zoology and Chemistry or Physics.
UTME Requirements: Five (5) SSC Credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and Physics.
Subjects: Biology, Chemistry and any other Science subject.

Direct Entry Requirements:
i)  Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Chemistry and any one (1) of Physics, Mathematics or Biology.

 

(ii)   ND/NCE with good grades in relevant 'O' Level subjects.
UTME Requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and Biology.
Subjects: Chemistry and two (2) of Physics, Biology and Mathematics.

Direct Entry Requirements:
)       Two (2) 'A' Level passes in science subjects including Mathematics

 

(ii)   NCE merit in Mathematics and one (1) other Science or Social Science subject.
UTME Requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics, Physics plus two (2) other Science subjects.
Subjects: Mathematics, Physics and one (1) of Biology, Chemistry, Agric Science, Economics and Geography.

Direct Entry Requirements: Two (2)'A' Level passes in Economics and any one of Mathematics, Statistics, Geography, Physics, Chemistry, Agricultural Science, Accounting, Business Management, History and Government.
UTME Requirements: Five (5)SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any two (2) of Arts or Social Science subjects.
Subjects: Economics, Mathematics and any of Government, History, Geography, Literature in English, French and Christian Religious Studies/Islamic Studies.

Direct Entry Requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes to include Literature in English and one other Arts subject.
UTME Requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include Literature in English, English Language and three other Arts or Social Science subjects.
Subjects: Literature in English, one other Arts subject and another Arts or Social Science subject.

Direct Entry Requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes including French and one other Arts subject.
UTME Requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including French and English Language plus one other Arts subject.
Subjects: French and any other two (2) subjects from Arts and Social Sciences.

Direct Entry Requirements: Two (2)'A' Level passes in Geography and any one of Economics., Government, Physics, Chemistry, Biology, and Mathematics
UTME Requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Geography, and any three (3) from Arts or Social Science subjects with at least a pass in Mathematics.
Subjects: Geography and two (2) other Arts or Social Science subjects

Direct Entry Requirements: (i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes from Geology, Chemistry, Mathematics, Physics, Biology and Geography.
UTME Requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Biology, Chemistry, Mathematics and any other subject.
Subjects: Any three (3) of Chemistry, Physics, Mathematics, Biology and Geography.

Direct Entry Requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in History and any other related subjects.
UTME Requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include History and English Language.
Subjects: History and any other two (2) subjects from Arts and Social Sciences.

Direct Entry Requirements:
) Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Mathematics and any other science subject.

(ii)           NCE merit in Mathematics and one (1) of Physics, Chemistry or Economics
UTME Requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics and Physics or Chemistry.
Subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of Physics, Chemistry and Economics or Geography.

Direct Entry Requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Chemistry and any one (1) from Biology, Zoology or Botany.
UTME Requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology and Physics.
Subjects: Biology, Chemistry and either Physics or Mathematics.

Direct Entry Requirements: NCE/Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Physics and Mathematics or Chemistry.
UTME Requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics and any other Science subject from Further Mathematics and Biology or Agricultural Science.
Subjects: Physics, Mathematics and Chemistry or Biology.

Direct Entry Requirements: Two (2) A' Level passes to include Government or History.
UTME Requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Government/History and any other three (3) subjects from Arts/Social Sciences with at least 'O' Level pass in Mathematics.
Subjects: Government/History and two (2) other Social Sciences or Arts subjects.

Direct Entry Requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes including Government or History.
UTME Requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in Government or History, English Language and three (3) other subjects.  A pass in Mathematics is required.
Subjects: Three (3) Social Science or Arts subjects.

Direct Entry Requirements:
Two (2) 'A' Level passes to include Mathematics or Statistics.

NCE credit in relevant subjects.
UTME Requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics and at least three (3) subjects from Physics, Statistics, Chemistry, Further Mathematics, Economics and Geography.
Subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of Physics, Chemistry and Economics.

Direct Entry Requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes or NCE in Biology, Zoology or Botany and one other Science subject
UTME Requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology and two (2) other Science subject.
Subjects: Biology and any two (2) of Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics.
